refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function creates AI task object which gathers all functions used for data acquisition from analog inputs. The function does not introduce new functionality, it wraps existing API into an object-like code and allows to write more readable and compact code. In order to get function list which can be used with object display its content.

The following calling convention applies:
obj.start(): Starts data acquisition - mdaqAIScanStart()
obj.init(): Initialize analog input data acquisistion - mdaqAIScanInit()
obj.read(): Read acquired data - mdaqAIScanRead()
obj.stop(): Stop data acquisition - mdaqAIScanStop()
obj.trigger(): Configure analog input start scan trigger - mdaqAIScanTrigger()

itemizedlist.listitem: obj: tlist type object gathering analog input scan functions
